column4: pheew, how can I make let's say "PROOT" text to do a certain command in console... kind of an alias or something
I mean if I want always to open some program with wine in console... can I somehow script it to open it with simply me typing "elasto"
I didn't... I didn't exactly understand, I am a windows veteran
make a script that calls wine, then make it executable and put it in your path
